verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:11
verses.text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:12
verses.text: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:13
verses.text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:14
verses.text: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 5:15
verses.text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
